data.author: Emerson Knapp
data.message:
Enforce use of pathlib, turn on mypy (#14)

* Enforce use of pathlib via Ruff `PTH` rule
* Turn on mypy as a precommit check, fix identified issues
* Change default playback speed to 1.0, users can speed it up but much of the time faster playback raises new behavioral issues. 
* Fix up use of ament_cmake_python to use setup.cfg for the CLI entrypoint, rather than installing a source file directly as executable

data.author: Emerson Knapp
data.message: Fix arm64 mcap download

data.author: Emerson Knapp
data.message:
The mcap binary download was making a lot of wrong assumptions

* Linux environment
* With `curl` installed
* As `root` to be able to write to `/usr/local/bin`

So instead,

* use `find_program` to find `mcap` if it's available on `PATH` at all, not just in one location
* Use native `FetchContent` to download the binary file instead of shell execution
* Install the binary to this package's install space so it's available to those depending on us, rather than assuming some global install location
* Restrict Nexus test to an environment where Nexus is available

data.author: Emerson Knapp
